question: 2 (b)
statement_html: If \(\displaystyle \int_{1}^{4} f(x)\,dx = 2\) and \(\displaystyle \int_{3}^{4} f(x)\,dx = 5\), find \(\displaystyle \int_{1}^{3} f(x)\,dx\)
statement_latex:
If $\displaystyle \int_{1}^{4} f(x)\,dx = 2$ and
$\displaystyle \int_{3}^{4} f(x)\,dx = 5$, find
$\displaystyle \int_{1}^{3} f(x)\,dx$
statement_raw: If <math> \displaystyle \int_{1}^{4} f(x)\,dx = 2 </math> and <math> \displaystyle \int_{3}^{4} f(x)\,dx = 5 </math>, find <math> \displaystyle \int_{1}^{3} f(x)\,dx </math>
